details.description: Returns scorecards matching optional search criteria. If search criteria is specified we will use search logic, which will not find Scorecards that have yet to be evaluated

parameters.description: Filter based on groups, which correspond to the `x-cortex-groups` field in the Catalog Descriptor. Accepts a comma-delimited list of groups
parameters.name: groups

parameters.description: Filter based on entity (either tags or CIDs). Accepts a comma-delimited list of entity tag or CIDs, please use only one type of identifier
parameters.name: entities

items.description: Entity identifier - can be a tag or CID

parameters.description: Filter based on team (either tags or CIDs). Accepts a comma-delimited list of team tag or CIDs, please use only one type of identifier
parameters.name: teams

items.description: Entity identifier - can be a tag or CID

parameters.description: Number of results to return per page, between 1 and 1000. Default 250.
parameters.name: pageSize

details.x-cortex-mcp-description: List all scorecards in the organization with optional filtering. View scorecard configurations to understand quality standards, compliance requirements, and maturity models. Supports filtering by groups, entities, and teams to find relevant scorecards

details.x-cortex-mcp-description: Retrieve scores for all entities evaluated by a specific scorecard. Returns paginated results showing how each service, resource, or domain performs against the scorecard's rules, including individual rule scores and overall scorecard scores

query.description: CQL expression to apply as a filter

RuleExemptionUserActor.description: Person who requested, approved or rejected the exemption

email.description: Email of the person who requested, approved or rejected the exemption

name.description: Name of the person who requested, approved or rejected the exemption

ExemptionActor.description: API key or person who requested, approved, or rejected the exemption

groups.description: Not to be confused with x-cortex-groups. These are the slugs of IdP or Cortex Managed Teams

items.description: Not to be confused with x-cortex-groups. These are the slugs of IdP or Cortex Managed Teams

RuleExemptionApiActor.description: Api key used to request, approve or reject the exemption

apiKeyLast4.description: Last 4 digits of the API key used to approve or reject the exemption

isDraft.description: Whether or not the Scorecard is in draft

lastUpdated.description: Time the Scorecard was last updated, which includes setting the next evaluation time

levels.description: List of levels associated with the Scorecard

rules.description: List of rules that are evaluated each time the Scorecard is evaluated

tag.description: Unique identifier, found in the UI

groups.description: Not to be confused with owners. This refers to the x-cortex-groups field of the entity.

items.description: Not to be confused with owners. This refers to the x-cortex-groups field of the entity.

id.description: Unique, immutable, 18-character auto-generated identifier for the entity.

tag.description: Unique identifier for the entity. Corresponds to the x-cortex-tag field in the entity descriptor.

TypeFilter.description: Entity types (e.g. service, domain, team) to include or exclude. Only one of `include` or `exclude` can be set

days.description: Number of days how long rule should be exempt. If not set, rule will be exempt until exempt until revoked.

ruleIdentifier.description: Identifier of the Scorecard rule to request exemption for

GroupFilter.description: Entity groups to include or exclude

number.description: Rank of the level where 1 is the highest

autoApprove.description: This will enable auto-approving of Scorecard rule exemptions. If not set, it defaults to false.

enabled.description: This will enable Scorecard rule exemptions. If not set, it defaults to true.

date.description: Date on which the exemption was approved or rejected. Null if the status is pending

status.description: Status of the exemption. Possible values are APPROVED, REJECTED, and PENDING

window.description: Number of hours between Scorecard evaluations. If the evaluation window is not set, the Scorecard is evaluated every 4 hours

EvaluationDetails.description: Evaluation window for how often the Scorecard is run

enabled.description: Whether this Scorecard should be included in notifications. If not set, it defaults to true for non-draft Scorecards and to false for draft Scorecards

scoreDropNotificationsEnabled.description: Whether to notify when an entities' score drops after a Scorecard evaluation. If not set, it defaults to false

description.example: This rule is very important because you must pass it

effectiveFrom.description: Date when the rule starts being evaluated

failureMessage.example: To fix this rule, visit [our internal doc][docs.cortex.io]

levelName.description: Name of the level this rule is associated with, if applicable

weight.description: Numerical weight of the rule. When using levels, this defaults to 1

ScorecardRule.description: List of rules that are evaluated each time the Scorecard is evaluated
